name: Apache HTTP Server Privilege Escalation
description: Apache HTTP Server allows local users to escalate privileges via crafted requests that trigger modules with elevated permissions.
solution: Apply the vendor patch or upgrade to a fixed release of Apache HTTP Server.

name: Weak SSH Cipher
description: The SSH service permits obsolete ciphers that allow attackers to brute force encrypted sessions with minimal effort.
solution: Remove legacy ciphers from the SSH daemon configuration and restart the service.

name: Outdated Software
description: Installed software packages are outdated and missing the latest security updates.
solution: Update the affected packages to the latest supported versions via the system package manager.
